page.title: 19SCHOOLS
page.content: The schools in our Domesday area are Alverstoke and Ashburton. The schools in 1985 have much equipment for everyone to use like: televisions,computers, videos, photocopiers,slide projectors and many other electronic educational aids. There are many books for the children to read. Many games are played like:chase,netball,football. In games lessons the children play rounders, cricket and tennis. Indoors they go on the apparatus,do floorwork,dance and team games. In lessons they do fractions,percentages,decimals and also comprehension,spellings,reading and writing stories. They have weekly cookery,needlework and Environmental Studies lessons(E.S. is finding out about the area in which they live).
